thread.title: BAD STAY
thread.title_full: BAD STAY - Review of Paris Marriott Opera Ambassador Hotel, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: 212Chanel
title: BAD STAY
text: short stay on Feb 23,2017, Someone walked into my room, while I was getting dressed and the front desk agents were not helpful. I reported the incident to the front desk agent and repeated my room number 3times to her but she wrote the incorrect number down. When I corrected her it seems as though it was a bother for her. I never received a call from mgmt. to discuss the incident.
